input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Gund 4048378 Dakota Horse Stuffed Animal Plush

Item features:
Dakota the horse, pink gingham saddle, fuzzy tan mane and tail, gingham flower bridle accent, adorable smile
Embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add chic, realistic detail
Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection celebrates the spirit of the west
Surface-washable; ages 1+
11 inch length (28 cm)
High quality, huggable, loyal pals for years to come. 
GUND has been a premier plush company for over 100 years; award-winning, beloved plush designs; appeals to next generation
Premium materials, unparalleled softness and huggability

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
GUND Dakota Horse Plush - A huggable version of every little girl’s dream. As an adorable addition to our Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection, Dakota The Horse is sure to be a loyal pal for years to come. Tacked up with a smile in pink gingham style, Dakota celebrates the spirit of the American West with the unparalleled softness and huggability of an award-winning GUND plush.  For over 100 years, GUND has made itself known the world over for their beloved plush designs. Made with premium materials. Ages 1+. 

Dimensions: Length 11in (28 cm)
input_text.Response B: Dakota the horse is a fun and adventurous companion for any child. Her pink gingham saddle and fuzzy tan mane and tail are a charming and unique addition to her overall appearance. Her adorable smile and embroidered horseshoes on her hooves add chic, realistic detail. Dakota is part of the Gund Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection, which celebrates the spirit of the west. This adorable stuffed animal plush is surface washable and measures 11 inches in length, making her the perfect size for cuddling. With her soft, huggable material, Dakota is sure to become a loyal pal for years to come.

label_annotations.feedback: I chose response A because it included the age suitability which is important for toys
